name: Can't Sleep Love- demo
description:
You just got broken up with. You were too good for them anyway.

But now you're lonely.

Like, REALLY lonely.

That night, you enter sleep paralysis. But something odd happens. You can move your upper body and talk!

Why is this happening? Is it because you're a witch? Are you some superhuman? Or are you simply so lonely that your brain is taking pity on you?

Pursue an odd cast of characters and make your way into the hearts of nightmares, if they have hearts, that is!

This demo built for a game jam includes

-At least three paths for each character

-Two character routes

-And one night

Much more will be added in the future, such as whole new characters not even seen in the demo, many more nights, and plenty of options for endings!

Thank you for viewing, and I hope you follow the development of this dumb game! ^^
